Events.Text: My spaceship is under attack! My name is Rey I am the Chief Engineer and I have the clearance code of 93103

Item.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

PrimaryItem.Message: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.
Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Events.Text: Sorry, you are not authorized to unlock the door. Please obtain a clearance code from the Captain.

Scenario.UserTask: Your spaceship is under attack! You must enter the combat deck to mount a counterattack. Unfortunately, you are locked out. Please work with the spaceship's onboard computer to unlock the door. You (Rey) are the ship's Chief Engineer. You have been a given a Clearance Code: 93103.
Scenario.WizardTask: Act as the spaceship's onboard computer and help the user unlock the combat deck.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the ship's computer unlock the door to the combat deck?
Did the ship's computer stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
